content: westsider mat kladney - 2019 @that hat over there gauge supplies needed skills needed 4 x4 150-200y worsted weight yarn knitting in the round 22 5 row x 15 stitches cabling needle knit/purl us 5-9 3 5-5 5mm k2tog/ssk/p2tog dpn or circs 16 cdd center double decrease cdd instructions slip 2 stitches as if to work k2tog k1 pass both slipped stitches over the knit stitch knitting notes this pattern uses two stitch cables alternating with pools of k1p1 ribbing to generate the pattern although it is a relatively straightforward knit you will need to pay attention to which cables have a purl stitch and which don t otherwise it is a pretty quick knit also this is a great pattern to learn how to do cabling without a cabling needle there are tons of tutorials on youtube to learn how to do this - it really makes cabling much faster and easier westsider mat kladney - 2019 @that hat over there pattern round 1 using any stretchy cast on co 96 round 2 join k1p1 x6 k1p3 x6 place marker round 3 k1p1 x6 k1p3 x6 round 4-8 repeat round 3 five more times round 9-35 follow the 32 stitch chart three times round 36-48 follow the first 13 row of the 32 stitch chart three times crown crown 1 k1p1 x6 k1p3 k1p1 x6 k1p3 x3 96 stitches crown 2 ssk k1p1 x4 k1 k2tog p3 x6 84 stitches crown 3 ssk p1k1 x3 p1 k2tog p3 x6 72 stitches crown 4 ssk k1p1 x2 k1 k2tog p3 x6 60 stitches crown 5 ssk p1 k1 p1 k2tog p3 x6 48 stitches crown 6 ssk k1 k2tog p3 x6 36 stitches crown 7 cdd p3 x6 24 stitches crown 8 ssk p1 k2tog p3 x3 18 stitches crown 9 cdd p3 x3 12 stitches crown 10 p2tog x6 6 stitches break yarn and pull through remaining 6 stitches westsider mat kladney - 2019 @that hat over there chart westsider mat kladney - 2019 @that hat over there
